p: The powder is creamish brown with a actinocytic stomata of stem. Clusters, rosettes, and crystals of calcium oxalate in bundles are scattered. Starch grains are mostly simple, vessels spiral, annular and pitted. Mucilage cavities encircled by a layer of epithelium fragments of pericyclic fibers associated with idioblast containing cluster crystals of calcium oxalate are seen [ 7, 8].
